```scss
// A set of constants for the style that can be used for the `style` property of Titanium.UI.AlertDialog.
'.alert-dialog-style': { style: Ti.UI.iOS.AlertDialogStyle.DEFAULT }
'.alert-dialog-style-login-and-password': { style: Ti.UI.iOS.AlertDialogStyle.LOGIN_AND_PASSWORD_INPUT }
'.alert-dialog-style-plain-text-input': { style: Ti.UI.iOS.AlertDialogStyle.PLAIN_TEXT_INPUT }
'.alert-dialog-style-secure-text-input': { style: Ti.UI.iOS.AlertDialogStyle.SECURE_TEXT_INPUT }
```
